About LasoHealth

LasoHealth is a transparent appointment booking platiform that automates all booking from submitting your personal information, credit reports and offers with online payments.

It now has a staff complement of 35 occupying modern offices, within Albion House, in the centre of the City of Chester and also at Nantwich Court, Hospital Street, Nantwich. Since its inception, the company has strategically expanded so that it now provides the same respected level of advice across the whole spectrum of commercial property, including industrial, offices, in and out of town retail, leisure and land.
